'''Yummy Yum Cha''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Honey Char Siu]] with [[Gaming]]. The recipe of [[Honey Char Siu]] is purchased from [[Chef Mao]].

Yummy Yum Cha restores '''14'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''350''' HP every 5s for 30 seconds.
